name: Gem Planet Merge
description:
Gem Planet is a wonderful casual Merge game for people who want to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain.
Combine cards with the same value to create a higher value card.

Feature:
● Super addictive gem merging gameplay!
● Achieve super combos, fun and uncompressed!
● Rich and diverse gems, waiting for you to unlock!
● Free and without any paid content, play as long as you want!
● Powerful props to help you get higher scores!
Now you can download and play for free, waiting for you to challenge!
